scripts.dev: concurrently -n "workflow,execution,gateway,frontend" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta" "npm run dev:workflow" "npm run dev:execution" "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: concurrently -n "workflow,execution,gateway" -c "blue,green,yellow" "npm run dev:workflow" "npm run dev:execution" "npm run dev:gateway"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend/workflow && npm install && cd ../execution && npm install && cd ../gateway && npm install && cd ../../frontend && npm install
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend/workflow && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:push: cd backend/workflow && npx prisma db push
